definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: As for the two-person conspiracy what, Gong Xiaobin tight- lipped about the same.
sentences.chinese: 至於二人密謀了什麼，鞏曉彬同樣三緘其口。

sentences.english: Since I cannot govern my own tongue, tho'within my own teeth, how can I hope to govern the tongues of others?
sentences.chinese: 既然管不住自己的舌頭，又怎麼能指望別人三緘其口？

definition: lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
to follow blindly (idiom)/to take as one's only guide
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to write off at one stroke
